name: 張正春
objective: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解數位訊號處理的理論基礎及其應用技巧。課程內容包含：(1)離散傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉轉換 (2)Z-轉換在信號處理上之應用 (3)FIR數位濾波器設計 (4)IIR數位濾波器設計 (5)適應性訊號處理介紹 (6)工程應用及實例研討。
schedule:
Week	Topic	Memo
1	Introduction to DSP	
2	Review of sinusoidal signals	
3	Spectrum representation and Fourier series	
4	Spectrum representation and Fourier series	Quiz 1
5	Sampling theorem	
6	Sampling and reconstruction	
7	Discrete time system and LTI system	
8	FIR filters	
9	Quiz 2 (MIDTERM)	
10	Frequency response of FIR filters	
11	Z-transform and its applications	
12	Z-transform and its applications	
13	IIR filters	Quiz3
14	DFT and its applications	
15	DFT and its applications	
16	FFT and its applications	
17	Introduction to adaptive signal processing	
18	Quiz 4 (FINAL)
scorePolicy:
測驗一(25%)、測驗二(25%; 期中考週)、測驗三(25%)、測驗四(25%; 期末考週) 
(Bonus: 全勤+5%; 期末報告/程式 +5%)
